title: Full-Sized Washer/Dryer, Assigned Covered Parking
posting_body: ['GLORIA PARK VILLAS APARTMENTS IN LAS VEGAS', 'We offer 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartment homes for rent in a small gated community.', 'We have garages and storage lockers for rent and we are pet friendly.', 'We have 2 swimming pools, spa, fitness center and gas barbecues throughout the community.', 'All apartments come with washer, dryer, refrigerator/freezer, oven/stove, microwave, ceiling fan, central heating/AC, everything is electric.', 'Resident will be responsible for all utilities in addition to the rent.', 'We charge for water, trash, sewer, real estate tax and CAM Fee and bill monthly through UB West.', "We do require renter's insurance with $100,000.00 liability coverage.", 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 46', 'OR Text', '46', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1000 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Energy Efficient Thermostat', '- Water Saving Faucets', '- High Speed Internet Access', '- Fireplace*', '- Vaulted Ceilings*', '- Full-Sized Washer/Dryer', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Granite Counter tops', '- Pet Friendly', '- Fully Equipped Kitchen', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Air Conditioning', '* Select Units Only', 'Community Amenities', '- Gated Community', '- Club House', '- Courtyards', '- Swimming Pools with Spa', '- 24 Hour Fitness Center', '- On Site Maintenance Team', '- Private Garages', '- TV Lounge', '- Movie Theater', '- BBQ and Picnic Areas', '- Assigned Covered Parking', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats & Dogs only, maximum 2 pets per apartment.', 'Dog 35 lb.', 'weight limit fully grown.', 'Breed restrictions apply, non-aggressive breeds only.', '$300.00 Non-refundable pet fee plus $35.00 monthly pet rent for 1 pet.', '$400.00 Non-refundable pet fee plus $50.00 monthly pet rent 2 pets.', 'Income Requirements:', '3 times the amount of rent, total household gross income.', 'Driving Directions', 'We are located between Spring Mountain Road and Twain Ave., on S. Decatur Blvd.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Gloria Park Villas', '3625 S. Decatur Blvd., Las Vegas, NV, 89103', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'hL6PNcLHgq']
